name: Athletics
description: Team sports, physical education, and the spirit of competition that has built character and camaraderie for over a century.

name: Academics
description: Curriculum evolution, innovative teaching methods, and the pursuit of intellectual excellence across all disciplines.

name: Arts & Culture
description: Theater, music, visual arts, and creative expressionthe programs that allow students to discover and develop their artistic voices.

name: Student Traditions
description: Annual events, ceremonies, and rituals passed down through generations that create a shared sense of identity and belonging.

name: Faculty Legacies
description: The dedicated educators who shaped minds, inspired dreams, and left lasting impressions on generations of students.

name: Campus Evolution
description: The physical spaces that housed our communityfrom modest beginnings to modern facilities that support 21st-century learning.

name: Service & Leadership
description: Community service, student government, and leadership development programs that prepare students to make a positive impact.

name: Technology & Innovation
description: From the first computer lab to modern maker spaceshow Browning has embraced and integrated new technologies into education.

name: Global Connections
description: Exchange programs, international partnerships, and the development of global citizenship in our students.

name: Alumni Stories
description: The remarkable achievements and diverse paths of Browning graduates who carry our values into the world.
